pages.text: $(thing)Health:$() 100     $(br) $(thing)Attack Damage:$() 8     $(br) $(thing)Behavior:$() Aggressive     $(br) $(thing)Spawn:$() $(l)Overworld$() $(br) $(thing)Description:$() $(br)Wanders around the overworld to scare the humans. If a human gets too close to it, it will fire a projectile called $(item)will-o'-the-wisp$(). It can only be hurt by a special enchantment called $(item)Demon Slayer$().
